data.name: DC Universe Online™ - Starter Pack by LexCorp
data.detailed_description:
Get the DC Universe Online Starter Pack by LexCorp, filled with items to help jump-start your in-game adventures! Includes:

  • LexCorp Automatic Sidekick
  • Initiate’s Starter Kit of gear
  • XP Boosters
  • Soder Colas
  • Stabilizers
  • Radar Enhancer


o To retrieve your items, visit the Redeem/Claim Window inside the in-game Marketplace.
data.about_the_game:
Get the DC Universe Online Starter Pack by LexCorp, filled with items to help jump-start your in-game adventures! Includes:

data.short_description: Get a jump-start on your in-game adventures with the the DC Universe Online Starter Pack by LexCorp!

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: P4 3.0GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1GB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 30 GB of Free Hard Drive Space
  • Video: NVIDIA 7800GTX+ or ATI 1950+ Video Card
  • Audio: on Board
  • Network: Broadband Internet Connection required
